mapper.select:
select count(*) from Freeboard where 1 = 0
or FreeBoard_title like '%${FreeBoard_title}%'
or FreeBoard_content like '%${FreeBoard_content}%'
or FreeBoard_name like '%${FreeBoard_name}%'
or 1=1
and FreeBoard_writedate between #{startdate} and #{enddate}
mapper.delete: delete FreeBoard where FreeBoard_boardname = #{FreeBoard_boardname} and FreeBoard_boardno =#{FreeBoard_boardno}
